question: Towards the end of passing out urine, a thick pale coloured fluid passes out as well. Is this mazi?
answer:
QUESTION
And do I have to repeat Ghusl if it this fluid contains semen? I do not masturbate. I have been told to squeeze the end of the penis so that the urine is completely passed out aswell. Jazakhallaahu Khair for your help. Asalaamu Alaikum
ANSWER


Share:
The fluid after urine is Wadi, not Mazi. The ruling of Wadi is the same as
urine wherein Istinjaa (washing the private parts) will suffice.

You do not have to put yourself under pain by squeezing the end of the penis
to remove the remaining urine from it. You may try alternative methods which
will not affect your health.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
